bibl.title: Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I

bibl.seg: CRIBIORE Raffaella, P. Col. inv. 179c (2): A Letter of a Teacher to an Old Student.

Jaakko FRÖSÉN, Tiina PUROLA and Erja SALMENKIVI (Edd.), Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I = Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 122, 1, 2007 (Helsinki, 2007) pp. 199-204.
Purchased on the antiquarian market in 1924 from Maurice Nahman. Oxyrhynchos (?), end of the second or beginning of the third century.
